post_content:
Hi Everyone,

Working on the monster! Thank you to those of you who helped me add over 100 cards to my collection over the last year. Currently, I am about 1/3rd of the way there. Given the volume, in an effort to minimize back and forth, I am looking to pay the price from the PSA guide (path at bottom). If you have cards that fit the criteria, assuming I don't already have that card, I am willing buy it/them off of you at the price listed below.

[url]https://www.psacard.com/priceguide/baseball-card-values/1909-11-t206-white-border/1055[/url]

Thanks!
Taylor

That price guide is pretty out of date at least for PSA 5s and higher cards. 
As someone whose building the monster in a 5+ range this might help for
PSA 5s generally start at $250 and up depending on the player and back
PSA 6s start around $450 and up depending on player and back

I cant speak for the 3/4 range or SGC but just sharing that that PSA price guide is not the most accurate or up to date

[quote name="DCJayhawk" post=2462609]That price guide is pretty out of date at least for PSA 5s and higher cards. 
As someone whose building the monster in a 5+ range this might help for
PSA 5s generally start at $250 and up depending on the player and back
PSA 6s start around $450 and up depending on player and back

I cant speak for the 3/4 range or SGC but just sharing that that PSA price guide is not the most accurate or up to date[/QUOTE]

I’d echo this - best way to find out reasonable price ranges is look at eBay recent sold auctions and then come up with an average.  The price guide prices are the same that they were when I was collecting the he last time around 8 years ago (not exaggerating).

If you have cards to sell at PSA pricing, please reach out. If not, respectfully, the color commentary isn't needed. At this volume, I need an ask price to point at. 

All the best,
Taylor
Pm sent. I've been breaking up my PSA 4-4.5 group and have several available.

[quote name="tbr5020" post=2462644]If you have cards to sell at PSA pricing, please reach out. If not, respectfully, the color commentary isn't needed. At this volume, I need an ask price to point at. 

All the best,
Taylor[/QUOTE]

I wouldnt call this color commentary by any means. Rather, this is the community trying to help and point out that the information you are referencing is badly out of date and thus may not be the best resource in your pursuit of the monster. No one here is crass or snarky by any means and we all ideally share our knowledge to help fellow collectors. 
As Mantle77CA pointed out look at the current REA prices ending tonight.
The PSA prices are my bulk buy price. If you have anything to sell at that price point, let me know. If not, best of luck with your sales.

[quote name="Thromdog" post=2462661]Pm sent. I've been breaking up my PSA 4-4.5 group and have several available.[/QUOTE]

Thank you Jeff!
We are all Buyers at those prices.
